HEADLINE: Bitcoin Futures Analysis Now with orderFlow Intel at investingLive.com
SUMMARY:
Trader Update: Bitcoin Futures OrderFlow Intel

Market Snapshot (July 28‚Äì29, 2025): Bitcoin futures have demonstrated dynamic swings, establishing a clear trading range between approximately $118,500 (support) and $120,300 (resistance). Here is the latest assessment based on recent price action and detailed OrderFlow analysis.

Key Observations for Bitcoin Futures in the past 20 hours:

  • Bullish Momentum (July 29 Mid-Morning):

    • The session experienced strong bullish interest with significant buying volume and positive Delta around 09:46.

    • Buyers briefly pushed price upwards to test higher resistance levels, peaking around $120,305.

  • Afternoon Bearish Reversal (12:48‚Äì16:06):

    • A clear reversal occurred around midday, with sellers stepping in more aggressively.

    • Volumetric data showed an important shift from buyer to seller dominance, confirmed by rising sell volumes and increasingly negative Delta.

    • By 16:06, sellers had taken temporary control, turning cumulative Delta negative, indicating sellers successfully overcame earlier bullish momentum.

Bitcoin Order Flow Dynamics (Balanced View):

  • Buyers: Demonstrated clear strength earlier, yet the momentum was not sustained into the afternoon. Their ability to defend the lower boundary (~$118,500) is now crucial.

  • Sellers: Gained significant ground from midday onwards. The recent increase in selling pressure suggests growing bearish sentiment, though further confirmation is required before confidently declaring sustained downside.

Bitcoin Futures Price Levels to Watch Closely:

  • Resistance: $120,300‚Äì$120,500

  • Immediate Support: $118,900‚Äì$119,100

  • Critical Support Zone: $118,500 (key area tested multiple times)

Current Bitcoin Price Prediction & Confidence Score:

OrderFlow Intel Score: -5 (Moderate Bearish Bias, Awaiting Confirmation)

  • Sellers have an advantage in the short term, but caution is advised until price clearly breaks below the critical support at $118,500 with continued strong negative Delta.

  • Conversely, a reclaiming of levels above $119,500‚Äì$120,000, supported by renewed positive Delta, would signal a potential bullish resurgence.

Bitcoin Trader Decision Support Summary:

  • Bearish Scenario (Short-Term Advantage):

    • Watch closely for clear bearish confirmation through sustained negative Delta and volume increases below $118,900. This would signal a higher probability of continued downside.

  • Bullish Scenario (Still Possible):

    • If buyers strongly return and successfully defend the current support zone with aggressive positive Delta and robust buy volumes, a retest of $120,000+ levels remains viable.

The market has tilted slightly bearish following a significant shift in OrderFlow sentiment from buyers to sellers during the afternoon. However, it remains prudent to await further confirmation before fully committing to a directional stance.

Trade carefully, manage risk effectively, and stay tuned for further updates.

This article was written by Itai Levitan at investinglive.com.

HEADLINE: Expect extended Bitcoin dominance bearishness, warns expert
SUMMARY: Bitcoin ( BTC ) dominance appears poised for further decline, with multiple technical signals aligning to support a bearish continuation. According to pseudonymous crypto analyst Master Ananda, Bitcoin‚Äôs recent breakdown from a long-term uptrend, accompanied by the highest weekly volume since February 2021, suggests a potential altcoin resurgence reminiscent of the early stages of the last major bull run, he said in a TradingView post on July 23. Bitcoin price analysis chart. Source: TradingView The Bitcoin Dominance Index currently sits at 61.42%, following a sharp rejection at the 64.35% level, which has emerged as strong resistance on the weekly chart. The failed breakout attempt left behind a notable bearish engulfing candle, indicating weakening momentum in BTC‚Äôs relative strength versus the broader crypto market. Bitcoin dominance now hovers just above key Fibonacci levels at 61.65% and 60.30%. Failure to reclaim former support, now acting as resistance, reinforces the bearish outlook. Therefore, a decisive drop below 58.94% could open the door for further declines toward 57.01%, and potentially 47.44%, creating room for altcoins to gain traction. Ananda drew comparisons to February 2021, when a high-volume breakdown in Bitcoin dominance preceded a widespread altcoin rally. Bitcoin dominance short-term play Current technicals suggest a similar setup, with Bitcoin likely to enter a consolidation phase as altcoins gather strength. While short-term pullbacks may occur, they are viewed as opportunities to reposition, with firm resistance and tightening timeframes pointing to an imminent decline in BTC dominance. Similar sentiments were echoed on July 28 by cryptocurrency trading expert Micha√´l van de Poppe. He noted that the Bitcoin dominance chart is flashing clear signs of sustained downside pressure, with a powerful bearish divergence continuing to weigh on the trend. Poppe‚Äôs analysis indicated that Bitcoin‚Äôs technical indicators suggest its outperformance over altcoins may be waning, at least in the near term. Bitcoin price analysis chart. Source: TradingView Notably, previous bearish divergences in Bitcoin dominance have consistently signaled short-term reversals, often triggering altcoin rallies. The latest divergence, which began forming in early June, has now been confirmed with a breakdown below the 52.50% level, pointing to further downside. While minor rebounds remain possible, the overall structure and declining RSI suggest momentum is shifting in favor of altcoins. As of press time, Bitcoin remained in consolidation just below the $120,000 mark, trading at $118,277, up 0.16% in the past 24 hours but down 0.76% on the weekly timeframe. Featured image via Shutterstock The post Expect extended Bitcoin dominance bearishness, warns expert appeared first on Finbold .

HEADLINE: Bold Words from the Famous Founder! This Altcoin Has Been a Better Investment Than Bitcoin Since Its Inception!
SUMMARY: Cardano founder Charles Hoskinson, known for his assertive words, made new statements about Bitcoin (BTC) and ADA. In a recent interview with Blockworks co-founder Jason Yanowitz, the Cardano founder claimed that ADA has been better than Bitcoin as an investment vehicle since its early days, surpassing it. Hoskinson referred to the 108,000 BTC he held after selling off Cardano when it was first launched. He said that if they had held on to those Bitcoins, they would be worth approximately $12.8 billion today. However, Hoskinson pointed out that Cardano''s market capitalization is currently $30 billion, which is approximately 150% higher than the current $12 billion Bitcoin holdings. At this point, Hoskinson argued that these results show that Cardano outperforms Bitcoin by approximately 2.8x, and as a result, ADA is a significantly better investment than BTC. Hoskinson stated that Cardano has been a better investment than Bitcoin so far, adding that ADA will continue to outperform BTC. ‚ÄúCardano is doing and will continue to do much more. Bitcoin will likely become BTC‚Äôs yield layer thanks to DeFi, and public chains will airdrop ADA almost annually thanks to Midnight‚Äôs launch model. Cardano''s Bitcoin DeFi will be four times larger than Ethereum and Solana''s combined DeFi. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Bold Words from the Famous Founder! This Altcoin Has Been a Better Investment Than Bitcoin Since Its Inception!

HEADLINE: Crypto Market Volatility Unleashed: K33 Warns of Urgent BTC-to-ETH Shift
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Crypto Market Volatility Unleashed: K33 Warns of Urgent BTC-to-ETH Shift The cryptocurrency market is a realm of constant evolution, where significant shifts can occur rapidly. A recent report from Norwegian crypto brokerage and research firm K33 Research has highlighted a critical speculative shift from Bitcoin (BTC) to Ethereum (ETH), issuing a strong warning about impending Crypto Market Volatility . For investors and enthusiasts alike, understanding these nuanced movements is paramount. Are we witnessing a major rebalancing of institutional portfolios, and what implications does this hold for the broader digital asset market? The Great Crypto Shift: Bitcoin‚Äôs Stability, Ethereum‚Äôs Surge K33 Research‚Äôs analysis reveals intriguing patterns in institutional engagement. July saw substantial corporate and ETF inflows into Bitcoin, totaling 115,165 BTC. Even after Galaxy‚Äôs 80,000 BTC OTC sale, a net inflow of 35,165 BTC confirms sustained institutional interest in BTC. However, Ethereum (ETH) was the standout performer. Ethereum recorded an impressive 52% gain in July, signaling robust demand. This surge is significantly influenced by institutional capital rotation, with smart money increasingly diversifying into ETH. This strategic reallocation is a key factor contributing to anticipated Crypto Market Volatility . While Bitcoin maintains its foundational role, Ethereum is rapidly gaining ground as a preferred institutional asset. Key Institutional Flow Highlights (July Data) Bitcoin (BTC) Inflows: Net 35,165 BTC after sales. Ethereum (ETH) Performance: 52% price appreciation in July. ETH ETF Inflows: 1.6 million ETH flowed into ETFs over six weeks. CME ETH Open Interest Dominance: CME ETH open interest climbed to 40%. These figures collectively illustrate a notable shift in institutional preference, influencing the broader dynamics of Crypto Market Volatility . Unpacking Institutional Appetite: New Phase of Crypto Market Volatility? K33 Research also examined the derivatives market. Perpetual futures open interest for Bitcoin soared past 300,000 BTC, reaching levels not seen since late 2023. This indicates renewed appetite for leveraged exposure. Notably, K33 observed neutral funding rates. These rates, crucial for market bias, often suggest significant hedging activity. This implies that while institutions take on more exposure, they are simultaneously managing risks, anticipating future price movements and heightened Crypto Market Volatility . This balance between speculation and caution creates a complex market environment prone to sudden shifts. What High Open Interest and Neutral Funding Rates Reveal: Increased Market Engagement: High open interest signifies substantial capital in derivatives. Balanced Sentiment & Hedging: Neutral funding rates suggest a market not overtly bullish or bearish, with significant hedging. Underlying Caution: Indicates institutional awareness of macroeconomic and regulatory uncertainties. This dynamic interplay underscores the market‚Äôs heightened sensitivity. Why the Pivot to Ethereum? Decoding Capital Rotation The data from K33 strongly supports a significant capital rotation from Bitcoin to Ethereum. Ethereum‚Äôs robust ecosystem (DeFi, NFTs, dApps) continues to attract substantial interest. The impressive 1.6 million ETH flowed into ETFs over six weeks, coupled with CME‚Äôs growing dominance in ETH open interest, are clear indicators of this strategic shift. Institutional investors increasingly recognize Ethereum‚Äôs multifaceted potential beyond just a digital store of value. Its utility as a platform for innovation, ongoing scalability improvements, and deflationary tokenomics post-Merge make it an attractive long-term investment. This reallocation is a major contributor to the current and future state of Crypto Market Volatility . Key Drivers of Ethereum‚Äôs Rising Appeal Vibrant Ecosystem: Largest DeFi and NFT ecosystems. Technological Evolution: Continuous upgrades enhance scalability. Growing Institutional Products: Regulated ETH-based financial products. Portfolio Diversification: Institutions recognizing Ethereum‚Äôs unique value. This evolving market narrative signifies a maturation where different digital assets fulfill distinct strategic roles for large-scale investors. Navigating the Storm: Key Triggers for Impending Crypto Market Volatility K33‚Äôs warning about heightened market volatility is tied to several high-impact events. These macroeconomic and regulatory catalysts have the potential to significantly amplify Crypto Market Volatility , creating both risks and opportunities. Upcoming Volatility Catalysts: White House Crypto Report: Potential new regulatory frameworks or enforcement priorities. August 1 Tariff Deadline: Could impact global supply chains and economic sentiment. FOMC Meeting: Federal Reserve‚Äôs decisions on interest rates and monetary policy. U.S. Employment Data: Influences Fed policy, signaling economic health or concerns. Each event car

Even after Galaxy‚Äôs 80,000 BTC OTC sale, a net inflow of 35,165 BTC confirms sustained institutional interest in BTC. However, Ethereum (ETH) was the standout performer. Ethereum recorded an impressive 52% gain in July, signaling robust demand. This surge is significantly influenced by institutional capital rotation, with smart money increasingly diversifying into ETH. This strategic reallocation is a key factor contributing to anticipated Crypto Market Volatility . While Bitcoin maintains its foundational role, Ethereum is rapidly gaining ground as a preferred institutional asset. Key Institutional Flow Highlights (July Data) Bitcoin (BTC) Inflows: Net 35,165 BTC after sales. Ethereum (ETH) Performance: 52% price appreciation in July. ETH ETF Inflows: 1.6 million ETH flowed into ETFs over six weeks. CME ETH Open Interest Dominance: CME ETH open interest climbed to 40%. These figures collectively illustrate a notable shift in institutional preference, influencing the broader dynamics of Crypto Market Volatility . Unpacking Institutional Appetite: New Phase of Crypto Market Volatility? K33 Research also examined the derivatives market. Perpetual futures open interest for Bitcoin soared past 300,000 BTC, reaching levels not seen since late 2023. This indicates renewed appetite for leveraged exposure. Notably, K33 observed neutral funding rates. These rates, crucial for market bias, often suggest significant hedging activity. This implies that while institutions take on more exposure, they are simultaneously managing risks, anticipating future price movements and heightened Crypto Market Volatility . This balance between speculation and caution creates a complex market environment prone to sudden shifts. What High Open Interest and Neutral Funding Rates Reveal: Increased Market Engagement: High open interest signifies substantial capital in derivatives. Balanced Sentiment & Hedging: Neutral funding rates suggest a market not overtly bullish or bearish, with significant hedging. Underlying Caution: Indicates institutional awareness of macroeconomic and regulatory uncertainties. This dynamic interplay underscores the market‚Äôs heightened sensitivity. Why the Pivot to Ethereum? Decoding Capital Rotation The data from K33 strongly supports a significant capital rotation from Bitcoin to Ethereum. Ethereum‚Äôs robust ecosystem (DeFi, NFTs, dApps) continues to attract substantial interest. The impressive 1.6 million ETH flowed into ETFs over six weeks, coupled with CME‚Äôs growing dominance in ETH open interest, are clear indicators of this strategic shift. Institutional investors increasingly recognize Ethereum‚Äôs multifaceted potential beyond just a digital store of value. Its utility as a platform for innovation, ongoing scalability improvements, and deflationary tokenomics post-Merge make it an attractive long-term investment. This reallocation is a major contributor to the current and future state of Crypto Market Volatility . Key Drivers of Ethereum‚Äôs Rising Appeal Vibrant Ecosystem: Largest DeFi and NFT ecosystems. Technological Evolution: Continuous upgrades enhance scalability. Growing Institutional Products: Regulated ETH-based financial products. Portfolio Diversification: Institutions recognizing Ethereum‚Äôs unique value. This evolving market narrative signifies a maturation where different digital assets fulfill distinct strategic roles for large-scale investors. Navigating the Storm: Key Triggers for Impending Crypto Market Volatility K33‚Äôs warning about heightened market volatility is tied to several high-impact events. These macroeconomic and regulatory catalysts have the potential to significantly amplify Crypto Market Volatility , creating both risks and opportunities. Upcoming Volatility Catalysts: White House Crypto Report: Potential new regulatory frameworks or enforcement priorities. August 1 Tariff Deadline: Could impact global supply chains and economic sentiment. FOMC Meeting: Federal Reserve‚Äôs decisions on interest rates and monetary policy. HEADLINE: Bitcoin Price Analysis: BTC Struggling To Build Momentum, Are Bulls Still in Control?
SUMMARY: Bitcoin (BTC) has recovered after registering a notable decline on Monday, when it fell to a low of $117,410. The flagship cryptocurrency is up almost 1% during the ongoing session, trading around $118,831. BTC has traded between $116,000 and $120,000 for two weeks, as it struggles to build momentum and push above $120,000. US Looking To Claim $2.4 million In Seized Bitcoin The US has filed a civil complaint seeking the forfeiture of $2.4 million in Bitcoin (BTC) . The assets were seized by the Dallas FBI. The complaint, filed in the Northern District of Texas, seeks the forfeiture of 20.2 BTC seized from an associate of the Chaos group, which has been tied to several ransomware attacks. The seizure took place on April 15 after authorities alleged the assets were related to ransomware attacks. If the forfeiture is successful, the BTC could be added to the US Bitcoin reserve, which President Trump mandated through an executive order signed on March 6. The US government holds 198,012 BTC , according to estimates by Nansen, Arkham Intelligence, and BitcoinTreasuries. However, a recent freedom of information request called that figure into question. According to a journalist, the freedom of information request revealed that the United States Marshals Service (USMS) only held 28,988 BTC . However, the journalist added that the figure does not include assets held by other agencies like the FBI or the DEA. Billionaire Ray Dalio Urges Bitcoin Allocation Veteran asset manager Ray Dalio has urged investors to allocate at least 15% of their portfolio to gold and Bitcoin amid growing risks in the bond and equity markets. The Bridgewater Associates founder stated in a podcast that macroeconomic risks associated with rising government debt in the US and elsewhere have not been priced in, which could lead to a substantial decline. Dalio stated on the podcast, ‚ÄúThe U.S. government is spending 40% more than it takes in, and it can‚Äôt really cut its spending. It‚Äôs accumulated a debt that‚Äôs six times the amount of money it takes in [...] and in interest payments that is $1 trillion per year, which is half [its] budget deficit.‚Äù He explained that the US government can pay its debts only by issuing more debt and by the Federal Reserve printing more money. This could lead to a situation where another round of quantitative easing or the government taking control of the Fed could lead to a major crash. Dalio added that because such risks are not priced into markets, investors must allocate a portion of their portfolios to gold or Bitcoin. Digital Commodities Announces Bitcoin Purchase Digital Commodities has announced the purchase of an additional 1.86 Bitcoin (BTC) using cash on hand. The total purchase price was $300,000 at an average purchase price of $160,544 BTC . The firm completed the transaction through Coinsquares'' regulated OTC trading desk, and aligns with its strategic initiative to acquire digital assets as an alternative to traditional currency. The latest acquisition takes Digital Commodities‚Äô total Bitcoin holdings to 10.56 BTC . The company also announced Nick St. Louis as its dedicated Bitcoin strategist. Nick will guide the company in developing and executing its corporate Bitcoin strategy. This includes evaluating and deploying all options to leverage capital markets while advancing Bitcoin as a solution for currency depreciation. SEC Delays Decision On Truth Social ETF The United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has extended the review period for the Truth Social Bitcoin ETF until September. The delay pushes the initial deadline by 45 days, giving the regulator more time to evaluate the application under its commodity-based trust share framework. The SEC has up to 240 days from the date of the filing to approve or reject an ETF proposal. The Truth Social Bitcoin ETF was filed on June 3, making the extension a part of the standard review process. The SEC stated that it needed more time to consider the proposal and any issues raised during the review period. The regulator has not made any formal objections so far. However, the ETF‚Äôs ties to Trump Media have drawn criticism about a conflict of interest and political interference. Bitcoin (BTC) Price Analysis Bitcoin (BTC) has registered a notable decline this week as buyers struggle to build momentum. The flagship cryptocurrency ended Sunday in positive territory, rising 1.31% to cross $119,393. However, it lost momentum on Monday, starting the week with a 1.12% decline and settling at $118,064. BTC‚Äôs drop has coincided with a broader decline in the crypto market, which is down over 1% in the past 24 hours. The flagship cryptocurrency has faced consistent selling pressure around $120,000, a level where it has faced repeated rejections. However, the repeated tests of a crucial resistance level tend to weaken it over time. Analysts have highlighted that BTC remains above $115,000, indicating that the bulls are not ceding ground to the bears. This mea

HEADLINE: Bitcoin Long-Term Holders Begin Distribution: Mirroring Fall 2024 Cycle
SUMMARY: Bitcoin trades at a critical level, holding steady above $118,000 but failing to gain momentum for a breakout. Price action has continued to tighten over the past several days, and analysts now anticipate a major move once either key supply zones are absorbed or demand breaks below. The market sits on edge, waiting for confirmation of the next trend. Related Reading: Bitcoin Demand Builds at $117K: Cost Basis Distribution Defines Key Support Level Fresh data from CryptoQuant highlights a notable shift in long-term holder (LTH) behavior. At $118K, LTH supply began to decline, signaling the start of a distribution phase. These holders, known for accumulating during downtrends and selling into strength, are now gradually offloading their positions. This transition often marks the later stages of a bullish trend and echoes patterns from previous macro cycles. As Bitcoin struggles to break past resistance and LTHs reduce exposure, pressure continues to build. A clean breakout above the current range could reignite momentum and drive BTC to new highs, while a break below support may trigger a sharper correction. Either way, the current standoff won‚Äôt last much longer. The coming days could bring the decisive move that sets the tone for Bitcoin‚Äôs next major leg. LTH Distribution Begins As Bitcoin Mirrors Fall 2024 Pattern Top analyst Axel Adler has highlighted a key development in Bitcoin‚Äôs current structure. According to Adler, LTH supply has declined by 52,000 BTC so far, marking a significant shift in behavior. These holders, typically seen as the market‚Äôs most patient participants, are now beginning to reduce their exposure‚Äîjust as Bitcoin remains locked in a tight consolidation range. This shift from accumulation to distribution closely mirrors the LTH behavior seen during fall 2024, when Bitcoin climbed from $65,000 to $100,000. In that period, long-term investors steadily sold into strength as the market pushed higher, locking in profits as late-stage momentum kicked in. Adler suggests that if the current trend continues, the distribution phase will intensify with each price leg up‚Äîjust as it did in previous macro cycles. The timing of this transition is critical. Bitcoin continues to hover just below all-time highs, while altcoins have begun to show signs of increased volatility. As Ethereum and other major assets begin to move more aggressively, capital rotation may accelerate. Whether this benefits or pressures Bitcoin remains to be seen. Related Reading: TRON Sees $1B USDT Mint: Liquidity Wave Incoming? BTC Holds Steady As Tight Range Continues Bitcoin remains in a tight consolidation range between $115,724 and $122,077, with the 4-hour chart showing price currently hovering around $118,817. After bouncing from the lower boundary last week, BTC has managed to recover and now trades above the 50 SMA ($118,175), 100 SMA ($118,228), and well above the 200 SMA ($113,777). These moving averages have flattened, reflecting the ongoing equilibrium between buyers and sellers. Despite several tests of the $118K zone, BTC continues to respect the key support levels, showing resilience as selling pressure remains muted. Volume, however, remains low‚Äîsuggesting that traders are still in wait-and-see mode, looking for a decisive breakout before committing to larger positions. Related Reading: Ethereum CME Futures Open Interest Hits Record $7.85B ‚Äì Is ETH Overheating? The upper resistance at $122K remains untouched since mid-July, and each approach has been met with rejection. A clean break above this level with volume confirmation would signal a continuation of the broader uptrend and could trigger a move toward new all-time highs. On the downside, a break below $115K would invalidate the current structure and likely lead to increased volatility. Featured image from Dall-E, chart from TradingView
TAGS: Bitcoin News|bitcoin|Bitcoin ATH|Bitcoin distribution|Bitcoin Long-Term Holder|Bitcoin Long-Term Holder Dumping|Bitcoin LTH|Bitcoin news|btc|BTCUSDT

HEADLINE: Tether-backed Twenty One ups Bitcoin stash to 43,500 BTC, eyes Strategy‚Äôs crown
SUMMARY: In a bold move to rival Michal Saylor-led Bitcoin giant Strategy, Twenty One Capital has grown its stash to over 43,500 BTC following a new infusion from stablecoin issuer Tether. On July 29, the NASDAQ hopeful announced that it had received approximately 5,800 additional Bitcoins from Tether. With over 43,500 BTC now on its books‚Äîworth an estimated $5.15 billion‚ÄîTwenty One Capital has firmly secured its position as the world‚Äôs third-largest corporate Bitcoin holder, behind only Strategy and MARA Holdings. Tether fulfills its commitment The latest entry includes two components: 1,381 BTC from a subscription agreement dated June 19, and 4,422 BTC from Tether‚Äôs existing obligations under the business combination agreement with Cantor Equity Partners (CEP), the SPAC facilitating Twenty One‚Äôs public listing. Of the 5,800 BTC added, 1,381 were acquired through a June 19 subscription agreement tied to new investor commitments, the firm said, without disclosing any further details. The remaining 4,422 BTC were contributed by Tether as part of its previously agreed obligations under the merger deal with Cantor Equity Partners (CEP)‚Äîthe SPAC guiding Twenty One‚Äôs transition into a publicly traded Bitcoin-native company. In early June, Tether sent 10,500 BTC to support SoftBank‚Äôs investment in Twenty One Capital, reinforcing the Japanese firm‚Äôs position as a key stakeholder ahead of the company‚Äôs public listing. Shortly after, Tether moved another 917 BTC to a separate wallet, linked to pre-funding for investors with the option to convert their commitments into equity. Twenty One Capital wants to surpass Strategy Each Bitcoin added brings Twenty One Capital a step closer to the summit long held by Strategy. However, the gap between the two remains vast. Strategy‚Äî formerly MicroStrategy ‚Äîholds an eye-watering 607,770 BTC, a figure that dwarfs even its nearest rivals and stands more than ten times above Twenty One‚Äôs current total. Sitting in the middle is MARA Holdings, the Bitcoin mining firm that holds the second spot on the leaderboard. Its reserves, comprising 50,000 BTC, while a fraction of Strategy‚Äôs, still keep it ahead of Twenty One‚Äîfor now. Saylor has a ‚Äúreal rival‚Äù Market watchers believe Twenty One‚Äôs well-capitalized foundation and political connections give it a competitive edge. ‚ÄúSaylor finally has a real rival,‚Äù crypto commentator Marty Party posted on X, referring to CEO Jack Mallers‚Äô stated intent to ‚Äúraise as much capital as we possibly can to acquire Bitcoin.‚Äù Since its formation in April 2025, Twenty One Capital has positioned itself as a pure-play Bitcoin firm. It is majority-owned by Tether and Bitfinex, with SoftBank as a significant minority investor. The firm is led by Strike CEO Jack Mallers, known for his vocal advocacy of Bitcoin and his work on Lightning payments infrastructure. The company plans to go public through a SPAC merger with Cantor Equity Partners (NASDAQ: CEP). Upon completion, it will trade under the ticker symbol ‚ÄúXXI.‚Äù Twenty One also introduced a new performance metric‚ÄîBitcoin Per Share (BPS)‚Äîto track shareholder value in BTC terms, instead of relying on traditional earnings-per-share metrics. However, unlike Strategy, which financed its Bitcoin purchases by issuing shares and debt, Twenty One was launched with nearly $4 billion in BTC provided by its founding partners. The post Tether-backed Twenty One ups Bitcoin stash to 43,500 BTC, eyes Strategy‚Äôs crown appeared first on Invezz

HEADLINE: The Long-awaited Analysis from the Financial World Giant BlackRock Has Arrived! "How Will the GENIUS Act Affect the Markets?"
SUMMARY: BlackRock, the world''s largest asset manager, made important assessments following the Genius Act stablecoin law signed by US President Donald Trump. The GENIS Act, which has been eagerly awaited for months, was finally passed and went into effect with Trump''s signature. While some experts expressed concerns that stablecoins would weaken the dominance of the US dollar, global giant BlackRock offered an opposite analysis. BlackRock said the GENIUS Act could further strengthen the US dollar, according to a report by Walter Bloomberg. BlackRock assessed that stablecoin regulations coming into force in the US could strengthen the dollar''s international position. Stating that the new tokenized dollar system will facilitate global payments, BlackRock said that this could increase the dominance of the US dollar. Especially in countries with unstable local currencies, access to dollars will become much easier with stablecoins. The US GENIUS Act framework for dollar-pegged stablecoins enables a tokenized payment system. And if a tokenized dollar system is established, dollar dominance will increase. Access to dollars will become easier, especially in developing countries where access and distribution of ADB dollars are difficult. This could stimulate demand for a more stable digital dollar instead of highly volatile local currencies.‚Äù *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: The Long-awaited Analysis from the Financial World Giant BlackRock Has Arrived! "How Will the GENIUS Act Affect the Markets?"
text: The Long-awaited Analysis from the Financial World Giant BlackRock Has Arrived! "How Will the GENIUS Act Affect the Markets?". BlackRock, the world''s largest asset manager, made important assessments following the Genius Act stablecoin law signed by US President Donald Trump. The GENIS Act, which has been eagerly awaited for months, was finally passed and went into effect with Trump''s signature. While some experts expressed concerns that stablecoins would weaken the dominance of the US dollar, global giant BlackRock offered an opposite analysis. BlackRock said the GENIUS Act could further strengthen the US dollar, according to a report by Walter Bloomberg. BlackRock assessed that stablecoin regulations coming into force in the US could strengthen the dollar''s international position. Stating that the new tokenized dollar system will facilitate global payments, BlackRock said that this could increase the dominance of the US dollar. Especially in countries with unstable local currencies, access to dollars will become much easier with stablecoins. The US GENIUS Act framework for dollar-pegged stablecoins enables a tokenized payment system. And if a tokenized dollar system is established, dollar dominance will increase. Access to dollars will become easier, especially in developing countries where access and distribution of ADB dollars are difficult. This could stimulate demand for a more stable digital dollar instead of highly volatile local currencies.‚Äù *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: The Long-awaited Analysis from the Financial World Giant BlackRock Has Arrived! "How Will the GENIUS Act Affect the Markets?"

HEADLINE: ETHW: Flows Don''t Lie, Ethereum Regains Its Footing
SUMMARY: Summary Ethereum''s momentum has surged, with ETHW up 85% since March, driven by renewed institutional inflows and improving ETH/BTC performance. Spot Ethereum ETFs are seeing record net inflows, nearly matching spot Bitcoin ETFs, signaling strong institutional conviction and capital rotation into ETH. Corporate adoption of Ethereum as a Treasury asset is accelerating, reinforcing ETH''s status as a credible institutional asset with significant upside potential. Despite potential short-term volatility from tariff risks, improving flows and favorable ETH/BTC dynamics make ETHW an attractive buy-on-dips opportunity. The Bitwise Ethereum ETF (NYSEARCA: ETHW ) is worth a revisit at this juncture. I last covered ETHW in March, when Ethereum ( ETH-USD ) was underperforming Bitcoin and the ETH/BTC chart was breaking down towards multi-year lows. The inflows into the spot Ethereum ETFs were also weak at the time. But in the hopes of a potential approval of staking in the U.S. spot Ethereum ETFs, I leaned towards a buy rating. ETH has picked up momentum, and ETHW is up 85% since that coverage. With crypto being an inherently volatile asset class, a constant pulse check on the momentum is important for investors to maximize returns. In this article, I''ll explore the renewed case for ETHW, the latest surge, and a focus on the ETF''s underlying asset, Ethereum. But before we dive into the article, it is worth taking a walk down memory lane on the spot Ethereum ETFs, the hurdles, and progress so far. The spot Ethereum ETFs were approved in May last year, five months after the approval of the spot Bitcoin ETFs. Just like the spot Bitcoin ETFs, the fund managers introduced early fee waivers and other incentives to win investors. Despite the varying fund structures, the ETFs essentially track the same underlying asset, Ethereum. Personally, I favor BITW as a top pick for Ethereum ETFs because of Bitwise‚Äôs extensive track record in crypto ETP products. In addition to that, Bitwise already has infrastructure in place with its staking products, which gives it an edge for seamless rollout in the event that staking gets approved for the spot Ethereum ETFs. I covered this strategic positioning for stake extensively in my last ETHW coverage in March. The initial momentum for the spot Ethereum ETFs was weak compared to that of the spot Bitcoin ETF. The recent turnaround in net flows into the spot Ethereum ETFs and the recovery of ETH/BTC are encouraging signals for bulls. What‚Äôs driving this surge? Is it sustainable? Is the top near? These are the key questions this article will examine, using data and on-chain signals that support a deeper understanding of Ethereum‚Äôs current setup. ETH/BTC: Ethereum''s Comeback Signal Ethereum has steadily closed the performance gap with BTC since late April, when ETH hit the yearly low of 0.01805 BTC per ETH. That was an almost 50% drawdown from the year‚Äôs open. ETH opened the year at around 0.036 BTC per ETH. The current reversal of the downtrend against BTC is important for our analysis because a rising ETH/BTC pair shows that capital is rotating from Bitcoin into Ethereum. And it is an easy way to understand the relative strength and performance of ETH against BTC. If ETH is lagging too far behind BTC for too long and then begins to recover, that rebound typically marks a sentiment shift. ETH/BTC trend (TradingView) The Catalysts Behind the Comeback It‚Äôs an entirely different narrative when straightforward data supports Ethereum‚Äôs comeback and validates capital rotation (as the case currently is). This gives fundamental weight to ETH‚Äôs relative strength and price action. If that were not the case, then ETH‚Äôs rally would look just like a meme coin with no structural thesis. The two main catalysts behind the recent turnaround have been net inflows in the spot Ethereum ETFs and the increasing (and somewhat surprising) adoption of ETH as a corporate treasury asset. Spot Ethereum ETFs monthly net inflows (SoSoValue) Monthly net inflows into the spot Ethereum ETFs have been positive since April, steadily climbing sequentially since then, and this month‚Äôs ( July ) net inflow of $5.19 billion is gearing up to be a record month. And here''s the standout development: this month, the net inflows into the spot Ethereum ETFs have nearly matched the net inflows into spot Bitcoin ETFs. The spot Bitcoin ETFs have recorded $6.01 billion in net inflows in July (that''s just 3.9% of their total net assets of $153.2 billion). Ethereum''s $5.19 billion in net inflows so far in July represent around 24% of its total net assets of $21.3 billion. The spot Ethereum ETFs saw $1.85 billion in net inflows last week, while the spot Bitcoin ETFs saw just $73 million in net inflows. Ordinarily, such a wide divergence would be considered an outlier; however, last week''s inflow marks the 11th consecutive week of positive inflows. In the week ended July 18 (the penultimate week), ETH‚Äôs net inflows of $2.18 billion nearly ma

HEADLINE: Crucial U.S.-China Trade Talks Conclude: A Glimmer of Hope for Global Stability?
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Crucial U.S.-China Trade Talks Conclude: A Glimmer of Hope for Global Stability? In an ever-interconnected global economy, developments in international relations can send ripples far and wide, often impacting even the most dynamic sectors like cryptocurrency. The financial world is abuzz following the conclusion of the second day of U.S.-China trade talks in Stockholm, a significant milestone in ongoing efforts to stabilize one of the world‚Äôs most critical economic relationships. This event, reported by the reliable Walter Bloomberg economic news account on X, marks another crucial step in a series of high-level discussions aimed at easing trade tensions that have long cast a shadow over global markets. Decoding the Latest U.S.-China Trade Talks : A Glimmer of Hope? The recent discussions in Stockholm represent the third round of high-level trade talks between the United States and China this year. These follow previous pivotal meetings: the May 10-11 talks held in Geneva and the subsequent June 9-10 discussions in London. Each round is a painstaking process, designed to bridge significant policy gaps and foster mutual understanding between the two economic giants. The very fact that these dialogues are continuing, despite the complexities, offers a cautious sense of optimism for market participants globally. For those closely watching the pulse of the global economy, the continuation of these U.S.-China trade talks is a beacon. It signals a shared commitment, however fragile, to prevent further escalation of trade disputes. The focus now shifts to the outcomes and the potential for tangible agreements that could alleviate the uncertainty that has plagued businesses and investors alike. Understanding the Tariff Truce and Its Critical Timeline A key element of these ongoing discussions revolves around the possibility of extending the ‚Äògrace period‚Äô for imposing tariffs. If a three-month extension is indeed granted, the existing tariff truce between the two countries is anticipated to last until November. But what does a ‚Äòtariff truce‚Äô truly mean, and why is this timeline so critical? A tariff truce essentially means a temporary cessation of new tariffs or an agreement to not implement previously threatened tariffs. Tariffs, which are taxes on imported goods, have been a primary weapon in the trade dispute, impacting everything from consumer goods to industrial components. Here‚Äôs why this extension is so vital: Market Stability: It provides businesses with a predictable environment, allowing them to plan supply chains, investments, and pricing without the immediate threat of new import duties. Economic Breathing Room: For economies grappling with post-pandemic recovery and inflationary pressures, avoiding new tariffs prevents additional costs that could stifle growth. Diplomatic Window: A longer truce provides more time for negotiators to work towards a comprehensive and lasting trade agreement, rather than being pressured by imminent deadlines. Investor Confidence: Reduced trade uncertainty can boost investor confidence, potentially leading to increased capital flows into various asset classes, including traditional equities and, by extension, cryptocurrencies. The November deadline looms large, making the progress achieved in Stockholm, no matter how incremental, extremely important. A failure to extend the truce could re-ignite trade tensions, leading to renewed volatility across global financial markets. Why Do U.S.-China Trade Talks Matter for Global Markets (and Your Crypto Portfolio)? It might seem distant from the world of Bitcoin and Ethereum, but the health of global trade relations, particularly between economic powerhouses like the U.S. and China, directly influences broader market sentiment. Here‚Äôs how these U.S.-China trade talks can ripple through to your digital assets: Impact Area Description Relevance to Crypto Global Economic Stability Trade peace fosters economic growth, reduces supply chain disruptions, and stabilizes commodity prices. When traditional markets are stable, investors might be more willing to take on risk in volatile assets like crypto. Conversely, instability can lead to ‚Äòflight to safety‚Äô or a sell-off across all asset classes. Investor Confidence Certainty in trade relations encourages investment and long-term planning. Higher investor confidence in traditional markets can spill over into crypto, attracting new capital and reducing selling pressure. Risk-On/Risk-Off Sentiment Trade tensions often lead to a ‚Äòrisk-off‚Äô environment where investors sell riskier assets. In a ‚Äòrisk-off‚Äô scenario, crypto assets, especially altcoins, can see significant sell-offs. A ‚Äòrisk-on‚Äô environment, often fostered by trade peace, can drive demand for crypto. Supply Chain Health Tariffs and trade barriers disrupt global supply chains, affecting corporate earnings and consumer prices. Disruptions can lead to broader economic slowdowns, impacting disposable income and investment

HEADLINE: Bitcoin Faces Pressure as Long-Term Holders Shift to Selling at $118K
SUMMARY: Bitcoin‚Äôs recent record-setting rally has triggered a notable shift in investor behavior, with long-term holders (LTHs) now offloading their stash, marking a potential inflection point in the market. On-chain data shows that LTHs, who typically hold Bitcoin for more than 155 days, have shed 52,000 BTC since the price reached its latest peak. Long-Term Holders Mirror Previous Distribution Cycles On July 29, analyst Axel Adler Jr. highlighted on X that LTH supply has dropped by 52,000 BTC at the $118,000 level, signaling a decisive shift from accumulation to distribution. ‚ÄúThe shift in balance from accumulation to distribution exactly repeats the LTH pattern from fall 2024 when the price rose from $65K to $100K,‚Äù Adler noted, suggesting that profit-taking could intensify as prices climb further. This activity has also coincided with mounting pressure on short-term holders (STHs). According to recent analysis by CryptoQuant, wallets holding BTC for one to three months now sit on just 13% unrealized profits, down from 69% earlier in the cycle and a fraction of the 232% and 150% gains seen at the 2012 and 2021 peaks. Adding to the complexity, Matrixport also warned of a potential ‚Äútactical pause‚Äù for Bitcoin as macro events, including the Federal Reserve‚Äôs rate decision and a White House report on digital assets, loom over the market. Historically, August and September have been among Bitcoin‚Äôs weakest months, compounding the risk of a near-term pullback despite a broadly bullish outlook for the end of the year. Price Action and Market Sentiment At the time of this writing, BTC was trading at $118,979, up slightly by 0.6% in the last seven days and 10.8% over the past month. It has traded in a tight 24-hour range between $117,498 and $119,026, reflecting waning momentum after a strong mid-July pump. While the asset is still 71% higher year-over-year, it remains 3.2% below its all-time high, and the shift in holder behavior is starting to weigh on sentiment. However, some market watchers remain unfazed. Rekt Capital, for instance, noted on July 28 that Bitcoin‚Äôs weekly close above $119,200 had formed a bullish ‚Äúflag‚Äù breakout structure, potentially paving the way for further gains if the level is successfully retested as support. Meanwhile, fellow analyst CrypNeuvo flagged a potential short-term dip toward $114,300 to fill a CME gap before any renewed push higher. If history repeats, this distribution period could provide an entry point for strategic buyers. But with LTH selling accelerating and short-term profits thinning, BTC‚Äôs next move hinges on whether it can hold $118,000, or risk a sharper shakeout before its next leg up. The post Bitcoin Faces Pressure as Long-Term Holders Shift to Selling at $118K appeared first on CryptoPotato .

HEADLINE: Hyperliquid traders stuck in their positions as API suffered short outage
SUMMARY: The Hyperliquid API is experiencing an outage, not allowing traders to close their positions. The event also means traders cannot close their positions and must wait for the service to return. Trading has stalled on the Hyperliquid perpetual futures DEX, as traders were unable to close their positions. The DEX experienced an outage of its API, meaning traders could not interact with the chain. Based on user reports, the outage persisted between 14:20 and 14:47 UTC. Just before the outage, some of the funding rates on Hyperliquid went negative. Speculations appeared of a coordinated attack or some other form of deliberate outage. During the outage, open positions could not be liquidated, leaving all users stuck with their positions until the issue is resolved. The event happened as Hyperliquid was carrying a record open interest of over $14.7B. The community still awaits a breakdown of the event, as the sudden outage sparked fears of a scenario similar to the inaccessible FTX trading just before the exchange crashed. The API crash also affected the Lighter DEX , which depends on Hyperliquid‚Äôs order books. Hyperliquid outage strikes as crypto assets turn the trend Users are reporting outages on both mobile and PC, and are completely locked out of interactions with the protocol. Users on Discord also reported getting error messages, unable to control their DEX accounts. The problem may affect the entire DEX, with no possible orders or actions available for all users. Users reported that even stop losses were impossible, potentially wiping out value from user wallets. getting error messages on hyperliquid on laptop and on mobile. can‚Äôt close positions, can‚Äôt add margin. can‚Äôt cancel orders. can‚Äôt establish a connection on mobile i‚Äôm freaking out. anyone know what to do? help @HyperliquidX pic.twitter.com/eIQSMCJYHi ‚Äî kismet (@kismet_wtf) July 29, 2025 Despite the downtime, Hyperchain was operational and continued to produce blocks. Currently, Hyperliquid settles positions on-chain every hour, and it remains to be seen what happens with short and long positions as traders are unable to close them. Potentially, a significant number of positions were at risk of liquidation, causing chaos on the market. The Hyperliquid outage arrived as BTC shifted direction, sinking under $118,000. A downturn would liquidate some of the open positions. Following the news of the outage, HYPE was still trading at $43.69. The asset relies mostly on its native DEX, with no chance to immediately trade or short. The Hyperliquid team has still not explained the nature of the attack. Over 500K accounts were affected While Hyperliquid boasts of being decentralized, the API outage and lack of frontend access meant over 500K accounts may be affected. The short episode raised the issue of depending on a single point of failure, even if the perps DEX settled all trades on-chain. Until Hyperliquid recovered full service, around $538M in net deposited funds were stuck on the exchange, based on DeFi Llama liquidity data . During the outage, one of the most prominent Hyperliquid whales, James Wynn, was caught in another risky long position. Wynn bet on PEPE, expecting the meme token‚Äôs recovery. Despite the general Hyperliquid trading outage, the position went through partial liquidations. The PEPE long position carries over $63K in unrealized losses, which were updated during the outage. Wynn was also partially liquidated several times, suggesting other positions may have been affected outside the control of their holders. Hyperliquid outage strikes as crypto assets turn the trend Users are reporting outages on both mobile and PC, and are completely locked out of interactions with the protocol. Users on Discord also reported getting error messages, unable to control their DEX accounts. The problem may affect the entire DEX, with no possible orders or actions available for all users. Users reported that even stop losses were impossible, potentially wiping out value from user wallets. getting error messages on hyperliquid on laptop and on mobile. can‚Äôt close positions, can‚Äôt add margin. can‚Äôt cancel orders. can‚Äôt establish a connection on mobile i‚Äôm freaking out. anyone know what to do? help @HyperliquidX pic.twitter.com/eIQSMCJYHi ‚Äî kismet (@kismet_wtf) July 29, 2025 Despite the downtime, Hyperchain was operational and continued to produce blocks. Currently, Hyperliquid settles positions on-chain every hour, and it remains to be seen what happens with short and long positions as traders are unable to close them. Potentially, a significant number of positions were at risk of liquidation, causing chaos on the market. The Hyperliquid outage arrived as BTC shifted direction, sinking under $118,000. A downturn would liquidate some of the open positions. Following the news of the outage, HYPE was still trading at $43.69. The asset relies mostly on its native DEX, with no chance to immediately trade or short. The Hyperliquid team has still not explained the nature of the attack. Over 500K accounts were affected While Hyperliquid boasts of being decentralized, the API outage and lack of frontend access meant over 500K accounts may be affected. The short episode raised the issue of depending on a single point of failure, even if the perps DEX settled all trades on-chain. Until Hyperliquid recovered full service, around $538M in net deposited funds were stuck on the exchange, based on DeFi Llama liquidity data . During the outage, one of the most prominent Hyperliquid whales, James Wynn, was caught in another risky long position. Wynn bet on PEPE, expecting the meme token‚Äôs recovery. Despite the general Hyperliquid trading outage, the position went through partial liquidations. The PEPE long position carries over $63K in unrealized losses, which were updated during the outage. Wynn was also partially liquidated several times, suggesting other positions may have been affected outside the control of their holders. HEADLINE: Revolutionizing Crypto Mortgages: Lummis‚Äô Bold Bill Unlocks New Homeownership Pathways
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Revolutionizing Crypto Mortgages: Lummis‚Äô Bold Bill Unlocks New Homeownership Pathways Imagine a world where your digital assets, your cryptocurrency holdings, could open the door to homeownership. This isn‚Äôt a futuristic fantasy anymore. A significant legislative push is underway in the United States that could fundamentally reshape how financial institutions view your digital wealth when you apply for a home loan. U.S. Senator Cynthia Lummis has introduced a groundbreaking bill that aims to require lenders to consider applicants‚Äô cryptocurrency holdings as a legitimate factor in mortgage loan approvals. This move has the potential to revolutionize crypto mortgages and democratize access to the housing market for millions of crypto enthusiasts. Understanding the Proposed Legislation on Crypto Mortgages At its core, Senator Lummis‚Äô bill seeks to modernize the traditional mortgage lending framework by integrating digital assets into the financial assessment process. Currently, most financial institutions primarily focus on traditional income sources, credit scores, and conventional assets when evaluating mortgage applications. The proposed legislation challenges this long-standing practice, aiming to provide a clearer path for individuals who have accumulated significant wealth in cryptocurrencies but might not fit the conventional borrower profile. According to reports, including those by Watcher Guru via X, the bill‚Äôs intent is clear: to ensure that crypto holdings are not just acknowledged but are actively factored into an applicant‚Äôs financial standing. This means: Broader Asset Recognition: Lenders would be mandated to consider a broader spectrum of assets, moving beyond just fiat currency and traditional investments. Increased Accessibility: It could significantly increase the pool of eligible homebuyers, especially younger generations who have invested heavily in digital assets. Regulatory Clarity: The bill aims to provide much-needed regulatory clarity for financial institutions, guiding them on how to assess and value volatile digital assets for loan purposes. This initiative represents a pivotal moment, bridging the gap between the rapidly evolving digital economy and the historically conservative traditional financial system. Why Now? The Growing Need for Crypto Mortgages The timing of Senator Lummis‚Äô bill is no coincidence. The cryptocurrency market has matured significantly over the past decade, with millions of Americans now holding substantial portions of their wealth in Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other digital currencies. However, despite this growth, these assets have largely remained on the sidelines when it comes to major financial transactions like home purchases. The current landscape presents a paradox: Many individuals possess substantial wealth in crypto. Traditional lenders often do not recognize this wealth adequately for mortgage qualification. This creates a barrier to entry for potential homeowners, forcing them to liquidate their crypto holdings, often incurring significant tax events or missing out on potential gains. Senator Lummis, a known advocate for cryptocurrency, recognizes this disconnect. Her bill seeks to address this by acknowledging the legitimacy of crypto as a form of wealth, thereby aligning financial regulations with the realities of modern investment portfolios. This legislative push is a testament to the growing influence of digital assets in mainstream finance. Potential Benefits of Adopting Crypto Mortgages The implications of this bill, if passed, are far-reaching, promising a host of benefits for both consumers and the broader financial ecosystem. Let‚Äôs explore some of the key advantages: For Homebuyers: Unlocking New Opportunities For individuals holding significant crypto assets, this bill could be a game-changer. It offers: Diversified Asset Utilization: Homebuyers could potentially use their crypto holdings without needing to convert them to fiat, avoiding potential capital gains taxes or unfavorable market timing. Increased Purchasing Power: For those with substantial unrealized gains in crypto, this could unlock significant purchasing power for larger homes or entry into more competitive markets. Financial Inclusion: It could provide pathways to homeownership for individuals who might not have traditional employment histories or substantial fiat savings but are rich in digital assets. For Financial Institutions: Expanding the Market While seemingly a challenge, this legislation also presents opportunities for lenders: New Customer Segment: Tapping into the rapidly growing crypto-rich demographic. Innovation in Lending: Encouraging financial institutions to develop innovative products and risk assessment models tailored to digital assets. Competitive Edge: Early adopters could gain a significant competitive advantage in a new market segment. For the Crypto Industry: Mainstream Validation The bill would further legitimize cryptocurrency as a m

HEADLINE: US China Trade Truce: Crucial Extension Signals Global Stability
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld US China Trade Truce: Crucial Extension Signals Global Stability In the often turbulent waters of global economics and geopolitics, news of stability can send ripples of relief, especially for those navigating the volatile seas of cryptocurrency. Recently, a significant announcement emerged that has captured the attention of markets worldwide: the US China trade truce has been extended. This development, initially shared by Walter Bloomberg on X, represents more than just a diplomatic handshake; it‚Äôs a pivotal moment with far-reaching implications for international trade, economic growth, and potentially, the very trajectory of digital assets. For crypto enthusiasts and investors, understanding such macroeconomic shifts is paramount. The intricate dance between the world‚Äôs two largest economies directly influences investor sentiment, capital flows, and the overall risk appetite that often dictates the ebb and flow of the crypto market. Let‚Äôs delve into what this extension truly means and why it‚Äôs a critical piece of the global economic puzzle. Understanding the Extended US China Trade Truce The concept of a ‚Äòtrade truce‚Äô might sound like a temporary pause in hostilities, and in many ways, it is. It signifies an agreement between the United States and China to refrain from escalating tariffs or imposing new trade restrictions, at least for a defined period. This latest extension is a continuation of previous agreements, designed to provide a much-needed period of predictability and calm after years of tit-for-tat tariffs and trade disputes that began in 2018. The initial trade tensions stemmed from various issues, including intellectual property theft, forced technology transfers, and massive trade imbalances. These disputes led to billions of dollars in tariffs on goods exchanged between the two nations, impacting supply chains, consumer prices, and corporate profits globally. The truce, therefore, is not a resolution of these deep-seated issues but rather a strategic decision by both superpowers to de-escalate and create space for ongoing dialogue. The confirmation of this extension, as reported by Walter Bloomberg, provides official acknowledgment of this continued commitment. It suggests that despite persistent geopolitical rivalries and economic competition, both Washington and Beijing recognize the mutual benefits of maintaining open, if cautious, lines of communication and trade, preventing further disruption to an already fragile global economy. The extension of the US China trade truce brings a renewed sense of stability to global markets. US China Trade Truce: Crucial Extension Signals Global Stability Why is this US China Trade Truce So Significant for Global Markets? The relationship between the U.S. and China is arguably the most consequential bilateral relationship in the world, influencing everything from manufacturing and technology to finance and commodity prices. An extended US China trade truce sends powerful signals across various sectors: Reduced Uncertainty: Businesses thrive on predictability. The truce removes the immediate threat of new tariffs, allowing companies to plan investments, manage supply chains, and make hiring decisions with greater confidence. This stability is particularly crucial for multinational corporations heavily reliant on both Chinese production and American consumption. Boost to Global Trade: While not a full trade agreement, the truce prevents a further contraction of global trade volumes. This is beneficial for shipping, logistics, and manufacturing industries worldwide, as goods can flow more freely without punitive tariffs. Commodity Market Stability: Major commodity prices, from oil to agricultural products, are often sensitive to US-China relations. A truce typically reduces price volatility, which is good news for economies reliant on these exports and for consumers. Investor Confidence: When geopolitical tensions ease, investors tend to shift from ‚Äòrisk-off‚Äô assets (like gold or certain government bonds) to ‚Äòrisk-on‚Äô assets (like equities and, increasingly, cryptocurrencies). This renewed confidence can fuel market rallies and attract new capital. To illustrate the shift, consider the impact of previous phases: Phase Key Characteristics Market Impact Trade War Escalation (2018-2019) Imposition of widespread tariffs, tit-for-tat responses, heightened rhetoric. Increased market volatility, supply chain disruptions, investor uncertainty, decline in global trade. Phase One Deal (2020) Partial agreement, China committed to purchasing more US goods, some tariff reductions. Temporary market relief, improved sentiment, partial recovery in trade volumes. Current Truce Extension Continuation of de-escalation, commitment to ongoing dialogue, avoidance of new tariffs. Sustained market stability, reduced geopolitical risk premium, potential for ‚Äòrisk-on‚Äô capital flows. Navigating the Challenges and Opportunities of the Extended US China Trade Truce Whil

HEADLINE: This Week In Bitcoin: 4 Things To Keep An Eye On That Could Impact Price
SUMMARY: As Bitcoin (BTC) continues to trade in a volatile yet increasingly bullish market , a crypto analyst points to key developments that could drive a breakout past $130,000 . From macroeconomic shifts to major technical breakouts and unexpected geopolitical tailwinds, the analyst outlines four critical factors to watch this week that could significantly impact BTC‚Äôs price action. The Trump-EU Trade Deal On July 27, crypto analyst Doctor Profit posted a detailed macro report on X social media, highlighting Bitcoin and certain bullish events unfolding around it. Before addressing the latest US trade developments , the market expert noted that Bitcoin recently pulled off a major technical move that went largely unnoticed by the market. After facing four consecutive months of rejection from November 2024 to February 2025, BTC finally broke through a long-term diagonal resistance tied to its 2021 all-time high . It then retested the level as support and followed through with a strong bullish move. On the macro front, Doctor Pillows suggested that a significant shift in the global trade policy could fuel Bitcoin‚Äôs continued upward momentum. He highlighted President Donald Trump‚Äôs announcement of a landmark trade agreement between the US and European Union, easing fears of a potential tariff war . The analyst described this deal as one of the most bullish trade agreements since 2016, noting that markets are likely to respond positively to the reduced geopolitical risks . With stocks set to open higher and economic friction easing between two of the world‚Äôs largest economies, Bitcoin also stands to benefit from the improved macro environment . Whale Panic Vs. ETF Power Earlier this week, Bitcoin saw a brief drop to $114,500 after wallet activity from Galaxy Digital sparked concerns of a potential selloff. However, according to Doctor Profit, those fears quickly faded as spot ETF inflows continued to outpace Bitcoin‚Äôs daily issuance. Institutions like BlackRock are also steadily absorbing supply, reinforcing strong underlying demand. Most importantly, the analyst highlighted that many long-term whale wallets remain inactive, indicating that the broader accumulation trend is still intact. Rather than signaling weakness, Doctor Profit suggests that the recent price dip appeared to have been a temporary shakeout that highlights the strength of the ongoing bull market . M2 Money Supply Sees Increase In his report, Doctor Profit stated that Bitcoin‚Äôs real macro engine is emerging from M2 Money Supply growth. Despite ongoing narratives around quantitative tightening, the analyst highlights that M2 has risen by 2.3% in 2025 so far, including a sharp 0.63% spike between May and June‚Äî the largest monthly increase this year. Historically, Bitcoin has closely followed M2 expansion , as seen during the 2020 liquidity surge that fueled an 800% rally. While exact outcomes vary, Doctor Profit suggests that the current pace of growth points to a potential 15-17.5% BTC rally to above $130,000 in the coming weeks, based on the cryptocurrency‚Äôs typical 60-90 day lag in reacting to monetary expansion. FOMC Meeting And Potential Rate Cut As his final bullish point, Doctor Profit mentioned the next FOMC meeting on Wednesday. While the official stance remains ‚Äúhawkish,‚Äù with only a 5% chance of a rate cut, the analyst noted that the Federal Reserve (FED) has been quietly expanding liquidity and printing. This growing disconnect between Chair Jerome Powell ‚Äôs rhetoric and the FED‚Äôs actual monetary actions is noteworthy. It suggests that the FED may already be laying the groundwork for the next round of quantitative easing. Given Bitcoin‚Äôs historical sensitivity to monetary policy shifts , the cryptocurrency may be well-positioned to rally significantly once the pivot becomes more apparent.
TAGS: Bitcoin News|bitcoin|bitcoin news|bitcoin price|BlackRock|btc|BTC news|btc price|btcusd|BTCUSDT|Doctor Pillows|Doctor Profit|Donald Trump|Fed|Federal Reserve|FOMC meeting|Galaxy Digital|Global M2 Money Supply|Jerome Powell

HEADLINE: Unlocking Cardano‚Äôs Astounding Potential: Why ADA Could Outpace Bitcoin 1,000x
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Unlocking Cardano‚Äôs Astounding Potential: Why ADA Could Outpace Bitcoin 1,000x In the dynamic world of cryptocurrency, bold predictions are common, but few resonate as strongly as those from industry pioneers. Recently, Charles Hoskinson, the visionary founder of Cardano (ADA), made a statement that has sent ripples across the crypto community: he believes ADA‚Äôs unit price could appreciate an astonishing 1,000 times, a feat he suggests is beyond Bitcoin‚Äôs reach. This declaration, as reported by The Crypto Basic, not only highlights Hoskinson‚Äôs conviction in his creation but also reignites the long-standing debate about the future leadership of the blockchain space. This profound belief in Cardano potential comes amidst his recent criticism of suggestions to convert the ADA treasury into Bitcoin, underscoring a fundamental divergence in philosophy and strategic direction. Decoding Charles Hoskinson‚Äôs Vision for Cardano Potential Charles Hoskinson isn‚Äôt one to shy away from controversial opinions, and his latest comments are no exception. His assertion that Cardano could achieve a 1,000x price appreciation while Bitcoin cannot is rooted in his deep understanding of blockchain technology and market dynamics. For many, Bitcoin, the progenitor of cryptocurrencies, represents digital gold ‚Äì a store of value. Its design prioritizes security and decentralization above all else, leading to a relatively fixed supply and a robust, albeit less flexible, network. Hoskinson‚Äôs perspective on Cardano potential, however, is dramatically different. He envisions Cardano not merely as a digital asset, but as a foundational platform for a new global financial and social operating system. This distinction is crucial: Bitcoin‚Äôs Role: Primarily a store of value and a medium of exchange, designed for scarcity and censorship resistance. Its fixed supply and proof-of-work (PoW) mechanism contribute to its robust security but also limit its scalability and flexibility for complex applications. Cardano‚Äôs Ambition: Aims to be a programmable blockchain platform, supporting smart contracts, decentralized applications (dApps), and complex financial instruments. Its proof-of-stake (PoS) consensus mechanism, Ouroboros, is designed for scalability, sustainability, and energy efficiency, offering a different paradigm for growth. The 1,000x prediction for Cardano potential isn‚Äôt just a number; it reflects a belief in ADA‚Äôs capacity to absorb significant global value by becoming an indispensable infrastructure layer for various industries, from finance and supply chain to identity management and governance. Why Does Charles Hoskinson See Such Immense Cardano Potential? The core of Hoskinson‚Äôs argument for Cardano‚Äôs exponential growth lies in its unique architecture and development philosophy. Unlike many other blockchains that prioritize speed to market, Cardano has adopted a research-driven, peer-reviewed approach, emphasizing security, scalability, and sustainability from the ground up. Here are some key differentiators that fuel his optimism regarding Cardano potential: Scientific Rigor and Peer Review: Every major development on Cardano undergoes rigorous academic peer review, ensuring a robust and secure foundation. This methodical approach minimizes vulnerabilities and builds a highly reliable network. Proof-of-Stake (PoS) & Ouroboros: Cardano‚Äôs Ouroboros PoS protocol is significantly more energy-efficient and scalable than Bitcoin‚Äôs PoW. This allows for higher transaction throughput and lower fees, crucial for widespread adoption. Layered Architecture: Cardano employs a layered architecture, separating the settlement layer (for transactions) from the computation layer (for smart contracts). This design enhances flexibility, scalability, and allows for future upgrades without disrupting the entire network. Smart Contract Capabilities: With the Alonzo hard fork, Cardano gained full smart contract functionality, opening doors for a vast ecosystem of DeFi applications, NFTs, and more. This programmable nature is a fundamental difference from Bitcoin. Interoperability: Cardano is designed with interoperability in mind, aiming to connect with other blockchains and traditional financial systems, facilitating seamless value transfer and data exchange across disparate networks. Treasury System and Governance: Cardano features an on-chain treasury system funded by transaction fees, governed by the community through Project Catalyst. This decentralized funding mechanism supports ongoing development and innovation, ensuring the network‚Äôs long-term sustainability and growth. These architectural choices, according to Hoskinson, provide Cardano with a superior foundation to scale and integrate into the global economy in ways that Bitcoin, by its very design, cannot. This profound belief in Cardano potential comes amidst his recent criticism of suggestions to convert the ADA treasury into Bitcoin, underscoring a fundamental divergence in philosophy and strategic direction. HEADLINE: Google AI Mode Unleashes Powerful Features for Enhanced Learning and Productivity
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Google AI Mode Unleashes Powerful Features for Enhanced Learning and Productivity In the rapidly evolving digital landscape, where information is king and innovation is constant, the advancements in artificial intelligence are reshaping how we interact with knowledge. For those deeply immersed in the world of cryptocurrencies, staying ahead means leveraging the most powerful tools available. Google‚Äôs latest enhancements to Google AI Mode are poised to revolutionize how we research, learn, and organize information, offering unprecedented real-time assistance and personalized insights that could prove invaluable for navigating complex markets and beyond. Revolutionizing Learning with Google AI Mode‚Äôs New Canvas: Your Ultimate AI Study Tools Google recently unveiled a groundbreaking addition to its experimental Google AI Mode : the ‚ÄòCanvas‚Äô feature. This innovative tool is designed to transform how users approach complex topics, study, and organize information across multiple sessions directly within Search. Imagine needing to prepare for an upcoming test or synthesize research for a project. Instead of juggling multiple tabs and notes, Canvas provides a dynamic side panel where AI actively helps you build and refine your learning materials. Personalized Study Plans: With a simple click of the ‚ÄòCreate Canvas‚Äô button, AI Mode initiates the process of structuring your study guide. It begins to assemble relevant information, which you can then refine through follow-up prompts. This iterative process ensures the output perfectly aligns with your specific learning objectives. Seamless Information Organization: Canvas isn‚Äôt just for creating; it‚Äôs for organizing. It allows you to collect and arrange insights gleaned from your searches over time, ensuring continuity and coherence in your research or study efforts. Future-Proofing with File Uploads: Google has also announced that users will soon be able to upload personal files, such as class notes or syllabi, directly into Canvas. This capability promises to significantly enhance the personalization of your study guides, integrating your existing knowledge base with AI-generated insights. This feature is a game-changer for students, researchers, and professionals alike, offering a personalized and persistent workspace within Search. Users enrolled in the Google AI Mode Labs experiment in the U.S. can expect to see Canvas rolling out in the coming weeks, promising a more intuitive and integrated learning experience. Experiencing Real-time AI and Visual Search with Search Live: How Does It Work? Beyond static information organization, Google is pushing the boundaries of interactive assistance with ‚ÄòSearch Live.‚Äô This powerful new capability integrates Project Astra‚Äôs advanced features directly into Google AI Mode via Google Lens, the tech giant‚Äôs renowned visual search tool. Robby Stein, VP of Product, Google Search, eloquently described Search Live as having ‚Äòan expert on speed dial who can see what you see and talk through tricky concepts in real-time, all with easy access to helpful links on the web.‚Äô The mechanics are surprisingly simple yet incredibly impactful: Activate Live Mode: Open the Google app, tap the Lens icon, and then select the ‚ÄòLive‚Äô icon. Point and Ask: Point your camera at an object, a diagram, or anything you need help understanding, and simply ask your question aloud. Conversational AI: AI Mode then engages in a back-and-forth conversation with you, leveraging the visual context from your camera feed to provide immediate, relevant information and explanations. This fusion of Real-time AI with Visual Search capabilities opens up a world of possibilities, from solving complex geometry problems by pointing your camera at a diagram to understanding unfamiliar mechanical parts. Search Live with video input is rolling out this week on mobile in the U.S. for users in the Google AI Mode Labs experiment, marking a significant leap in how we interact with digital information in the physical world. Expanding AI Search Beyond the Browser: Desktop and Document Insights The enhancements to Google AI Mode are not limited to mobile or new features; they also extend to existing functionalities, making them more versatile and accessible. Google announced that users will soon be able to leverage Lens within AI Search to inquire about content directly on their desktop screens. This means a seamless transition from passive viewing to active inquiry. Consider a scenario where you‚Äôre grappling with a complex diagram in an online document. Instead of manually searching for explanations, you‚Äôll be able to: Click ‚ÄòAsk Google about this page‚Äô from your address bar. Select the specific diagram or section you want to understand better. Receive an AI Overview with key information directly in the side panel. Follow up with more questions through Google AI Mode , diving deeper into the topic by selecting AI Mode at the top of the Lens search results or clicking the
